title: Sebastian Vettel Scares Will Buxton in a Ferrari F12 in Texas - Off the Grid
description: Sebastian Vettel drives NBC Sport's F1 host Will Buxton around Driveway Austin Motorsports Park in Texas while interviewing him with true and false questions from the passenger seat.
tags: Formula 1, Ferrari, F12 Berlinetta, Sebastian Vettel, Circuit of the Americas, COTA, Off the Grid, motorsport, racing
